schema.title: AbstractFacilitySpecification
schema.description: A property, characteristic, or attribute about a facility that is not described explicitly elsewhere.

EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time at which the facility specification instance becomes effective.

TerminationDateTime.description: The date and time at which the facility specification instance is no longer in effect.

FacilitySpecificationQuantity.description: The value for the specified parameter type.

FacilitySpecificationDateTime.description: The actual date and time value of the parameter.

FacilitySpecificationIndicator.description: The actual indicator value of the parameter.

FacilitySpecificationText.description: The actual text value of the parameter.

UnitOfMeasureID.description: The unit for the quantity parameter, like metre (m in SI units system) for quantity Length.

ParameterTypeID.description: Parameter type of property or characteristic.
